titleInfo.title: On the order of the phase transition in the 3D three-state Potts model with anti-ferromagnetic next-to-nearest neighbour coupling

bibliographicCitation.apa: Gavai, R. V., & Karsch, F. (1989). On the order of the phase transition in the 3D three-state Potts model with anti-ferromagnetic next-to-nearest neighbour coupling. Physics Letters, B, 233(3-4), 417-422. https://doi.org/10.1016/0370-2693(89)91333-6
